mapper.select: select id from member where id = hex( aes_encrypt( #{ id }, #{ key } ) )
mapper.insert: insert into member values( null, hex( aes_encrypt( #{ id }, #{ key } ) ), SHA2(#{ password }, 512), hex( aes_encrypt( #{ name }, #{ key } ) ), hex( aes_encrypt( #{ email }, #{ key } ) ), hex( aes_encrypt( #{ birth }, #{ key } ) ), #{ gender }, hex( aes_encrypt( #{ phone }, #{ key } ) ), current_timestamp(), default, 'Y' )
mapper.select: select no, aes_decrypt(unhex(id), #{ key }) id, convert(aes_decrypt(unhex(name), #{ key }) using utf8) name, aes_decrypt(unhex(email), #{ key }) email, aes_decrypt(unhex(birth), #{ key }) birth, gender, aes_decrypt(unhex(phone), #{ key }) phone, joinDate from member where id = hex( aes_encrypt( #{ id }, #{ key } ) ) and password = SHA2( #{ password }, 512 ) and status = 'Y';
